extractions.title: Similarities and differences between Alzheimer's disease and schizophrenia: drug target Mendelian randomization and transcriptome analysis.

extractions.method_detail: LDSC was performed using GWAS summary statistics from Lambert et al. meta-analysis to estimate SNP-heritability of Alzheimer's disease and then genetic correlation with schizophrenia; no numerical h² values reported.
extractions.source_text: "Linkage Disequilibrium Score Regression (LDSC) was performed to first estimate the heritability of two traits, Alzheimer's disease (AD) and schizophrenia (SZ), and subsequently calculate the genetic

extractions.method_detail: LDSC was performed using GWAS summary statistics from the Schizophrenia Working Group of the Psychiatric Genomics Consortium to estimate SNP-heritability of schizophrenia and then genetic correlation with Alzheimer's disease; no numerical h² values reported.

extractions.title: Identification of pathogenic cell types and shared genetic loci and genes for Alzheimer's disease and inflammatory bowel disease.

extractions.title: Uncovering pleiotropic loci in allergic rhinitis and leukocyte traits through multi-trait GWAS.

extractions.method_detail: Single-trait LD Score regression using GWAS summary statistics for AR; HapMap3 SNP LD scores based on European 1000 Genomes reference; INFO > 0.9
extractions.source_text: "We utilized LDSC to estimate SNP-based heritability, thereby determining the proportion of phenotypic variance explained by the detected variants. Based on the summary statistics from GWAS on allergi
extractions.evidence_html: ...Welch’s t-test was then used to compare CD28 gene expression levels across these groups. ## Results We utilized LDSC to estimate SNP-based heritability, thereby determining the proportion of phenotypic variance explained by the detected variants. Based on the summary statistics from GWAS on allergic rhinitis, the estimated heritability on the observed scale was 2.08% in the European population and 1.03% in the East Asian population. For eosinophils, the estimated heritability on the observed scale was 19.64% in Europeans and 11.14...
